name: Boiled Lobster
author: Venita Johnson
summary: I learned this style of cooking from my mother-in-law. This recipe will work with crawfish or shrimp. You can add as many lobsters as you want, but cook no more than two at a time.
ingredients: 10 cloves garlic, peeled and cut in half
directions: Pour the water into a large pot and add the onions, garlic, lemons, oranges, celery, black pepper, seasoned salt and jalapeno peppers
Bring to a full rolling boil and boil for 20 minutes
Add the lobsters and place a lid over the pot
Boil for 15 minutes (depending on the size of your lobsters)
Remove the lobsters from the pot, and place in a colander under cool running water to stop the cooking
